field.name: TypeID
field.sql: select TypeID, Name_$lang; Name from ut_gladiator_types order by Name

field.name: CountryID
field.sql: select CountryID, Name_$lang; from ut_countries order by CountryID

select.action: update ut_gladiator_countries2 set Rate=@Rate; where RecordID=@RecordID;

update.sql: update ut_gladiator_countries2 set CountryID=@CountryID;, TypeID=@TypeID;,Rate=@Rate; where RecordID=$id;
